content: cozy up your teapot can wear this stylish turtleneck with the collar turned in folded out or even twisted and then folded down you can open it up to add more water and then re-close it **measurements ** flat unstretched 6 wide x 12 tall fits most 6 to 8 cup teapots **materials ** 1 ball of patons classic wool worsted 100 grams 3 53 ounces 210 yards 192 meters 4 0mm & 5 0mm circular needles or double pointed needles or sizes as required for gauge/purpose 1 stitch marker optional yarn needle for weaving **pattern notes ** knit bottom up starts in the round splits for 2 sides worked flat then rejoins in the round to finish the top tube please let me know if you find any mistakes or have suggestions or comments thanks **22dec2016 a mistake has been found as follows ** switch to 5 0mm needle right side facing increase row sl 1 pw wyif k1 m1k k1 p1 m1p p1 **repeat 9 more times** to last 3 sts of this half k1 m1k k2 59sts it should read repeat 8 more times i will correct the pattern as soon as i get a chance
